data.name: Lunatic
data.detailed_description:
Lunatic is a single-player psychological horror game where you enter a reported house to investigate. You can explore the house in first-person mode.

Subject: Neighbors reported a scream from a man's apartment next door. They claim that different women have been coming in and out of the house lately. You're a police officer and it's your duty to check it out.

Investigate: Search the house to find information about the case. You will need to find keys and passwords to unlock doors that come to your way.

Environment: The house is dark so you might need your flashlight.

Case: The only things you know about the case are that there have been some women coming in and out of the house and a scream.

data.short_description: Neighbors reported a scream from a man's apartment next door. They claim that different women have been coming in and out of the house lately. You're a police officer and it's your duty to check it out.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
